title: 1-C: ABS Hydraulic Unit Operation Check

body.body: When the ignition switch is turned to the ON position, it is normal that the ABS warning light
will flash on and off. The light will continue to flash after engine start-up until the motorcycle first reaches a speed exceeding 6 mph (10 km/h) when it will go off.
If there is a fault with the ABS system the warning light
The warning light should not illuminate again until the engine is restarted unless there is a fault, or:
ABS is switched off - the warning light will remain illuminated.
ABS is set to Off Road – the warning light will flash slowly.
